import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import { Tag } from '../shared/models/Tag'; import {ClothesService} from "../services/clothes/clothes.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() clothePageTags?: string[]; @Input() justifyContent : string = 'center'; status : boolean; tags?: Tag[]; tagName: any; constructor(private clotheService: ClothesService) { this.status = false; } ngOnInit(): void { if(!this.clothePageTags) this.tags = this.clotheService.getAllTags(); } }
